column5: ....according to Environment Canada  Keep your heads up guys, it could get nasty down your way.
This weather can cause havic anywhere .As Lew said ,take care !

Temperature read out in the truck, when leaving Mt Sinai this afternoon read 37C... towering cumulous clouds up the ying yang to the North. Would be of no surprise that someone got nailed and nailed hard.

It blew a cushion half way across the deck. Close call.  It was a little windy in our area and some heavy rain around 6pm then it got sunny. Rain started back up around 7:30 and we had a good light show for 45 minutes but it seems to be settling down now.
Lots of lightning, gusty winds and a bit of rain (that we really need) - nothing too severe here in St Thomas
